name: notedraw-mcp-app
description: Notedraw MCP App server with Excalidraw-compatible preview/edit parity and workspace scene tools.
long_description: An MCP App server for Notedraw that preserves Excalidraw MCP preview/edit parity (read_me + create_view + checkpoints + export) and adds workspace-scoped scene tools for internal assistant orchestration.

tools.name: read_me
tools.description: Returns the Excalidraw element format reference with color palettes, examples, and tips. Call this before using create_view.

tools.name: create_view
tools.description: Renders a hand-drawn diagram using Excalidraw elements with streaming draw-on animations.
